locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, TA is the worst truck stop chain out there. Reserving a shower is a whole adventure. And only the most patient or unemployed driver can actually wait for it. I’ve been sitting here for over an hour waiting for my shower. That …
terrible, the toilet has no hot water, and towels, the line for the shower is in the hallway, washing machines are "greedy" and charge a commission for credit card payments
They got bk and Taco Bell fresh and hot. Pumps was working shower was hot and clean

I stayed at the TA in Fort Bridger Wyoming last night when I went in for a shower this morning there was something wrong with the computers. An employee named Tod Was working to resolve the issue. Later learn the Todd also keeps the showers …

… The restrooms are under renovation right now so the wait for a shower or to use the restroom can be a little longer than normal. Staff here has always been friendly and curious. I just like this place in general.

Shower was nice. Big & roomy. The restaurant part was filthy.  Every table needed cleaned.  The floor was covered in sticky spilled pop and  condiments. When employees weren't busy they stood around talking instead of cleaning.  They need …
Shower 8 sucks. The hot water doesn’t work.  Poor quality showers. Like most TAs, not great places.

… save money and it makes us have to wait longer in line for service... And their kiosk does not work properly is very hard to get a shower ticket..  And they are always working on the pumps whether it's cleaning or maintenance early in the …
Very Busy Shower Nobody Cleaning  watting To Much Time More then 2 Hour
Very bad place! Went to take a shower in it, the temperature was very low and there was no hot water!

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … in line unattended for an extended period of time. To make matters worse, we arrived in hopes of getting a nice, hot shower & eat dinner to signs stating Subway was closed & so were the showers. We arrived around 5:30 PM & left the next …

4 pumps idle , drivers park at pump and they park in front of pump and go shower , truck stop is backed up to the street , nothing new , i just only finally posted something because Im sick of coming here and losing 2 hours
The showers were very clean and the water was hot.  Russell who was working in the back gave extra care and attention.  He put us in the larger shower stall and extra clean towels to use.

Friendly staff all with great sense of humor that includes the subway staff. Shower clean with great water pressure, even tho the shower heads leak a little. Fully working washer and dryers for laundry. Parking can be a challenge depending …
While I was waiting shower bus passengers came all the were opened for them while am in line clocked 2hours waiting shower suck
Every time I go into this store and fuel I get ripped off of my points and shower credits …

Typical Pilot Flying J. Laundry room completely out of order, bathroom dirty, no decent food, parking lot is a mess, some of the pumps not working and shower was lukewarm. PFJ just needs to go out of business and let someone who cares take …

Noon on a Saturday, parking lot only half full, they have 7 showers but we waited 25 minutes for one. If you're a team trying to shower on 30, consider another place. Otherwise it was clean and well staffed.
Drivers, I'm out of work and made a long trip in my personal. These kind folk gave me a free shower. I hope you make a stop here if you're not sure. They deserve us drivers' money.

I pulled in at 10 am got fuel parked went in and didn't even have to wait for a shower.  So I go back to my truck and hang out, around  2:30 pm I go in and get a couple slices of bbq pizza go back to the truck and eat it and hang out. And …

locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Mid size pilot very clean shower inside is small .but,want if something to eat  just next door Japanese  restaurant good food get along for money. mrs.gayl appreciate that cashier .she deal with each  customer respectfully.i didn't feel …

Hey guys don’t take showers from these guys . I took ahower from them when i go inside the shower . And when i turn it on . They have ice melt water . Which was really cold as hell . Or either they have boiling water . I already put soap on …
Why is there cold water in the shower in winter?  Can you explain the administration?  people leave so much money at your dirty gas stations and you can't provide them with warm water ..

I stopped at Flying J during my travels and was thoroughly impressed with the cleanliness and quality of their showers. It’s clear they take pride in maintaining a welcoming and comfortable environment for their guests. The shower area was …
I bought a shower in the app and waited 30 minutes, the next person in line never turned on. When I told the service staff, they refused and said they didn't clean.

Two showers that need to be cleaned and I have been waiting for 15 min for a shower. This place has really gone down hill and by the looks of the things it’s still going down. Don’t waste your time go to the pilot or just keep goin on by.

… was ice all over, deepish snow and the I-80 was closed. We had a reserve, went in for a shower but didn't have the time to wait for them to clean ( because we had to get some sleep). We decided to just call it a night and went to see if we …

The showers were reasonably clean, but its a shame that I can't say the same for myself after my shower. Both soap dispensers were empty so all I  could do was wet myself down. The water was nice and hot though and pressure was ok …
Easily the cleanest Pilot/Flying J shower I've ever had. I've been to a lot of the PFJ's in the western states, and this hands down is the cleanest shower I've utilized. …

… on restroom floors.  They don't keep up on the coffee..empty allot of the times in the morning.  Toilet tissue was empty in the shower room last time and left a used towel hanging on the door. Need better management overseeing these things.

locations.content: Point of Rocks Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nothing special outside look until come inside and talk to the cook. Very good food and good price. Brand new washer and dryer. Shower for truckers. Will make trip plan to stop every time.

showerReviews.reviewText: … so low. We pulled in after 9pm (30-foot RV) and there was ample parking that wasn't next to truck so we were well out of their way. The shower ($7) was clean, warm with good pressure. The coffee was great in the morning. Would totally stop …

Western Travel Terminal is a great place to fill up on fuel, on snacks, coffee, to grab a bite to eat, get a clean shower, or drink suds & cocktails. The waitstaff is really friendly & the food tasty. You'd be hard put to find a better …
